result.name: Comparative genome sequencing for identification of valuable genes in Indigenous Badri cow (Hill cattle) of Uttarakhand
result.description: Genome wide association studies, identitification and annotation of variants in genes for economically important traits, diversity studies of colour coat variants of Badri cattle. Data generated by Dr Javid Ur Rahman, Dr B.N Shah, Dr S.P Singh.  The College of Veterinary and Animal Sciences, Department of Animal Genetics and Breeding, and Department of Veterinary Pharmacology and Toxicology
result.center: Govind Ballabh Pant University of Agriculture and Technology , Uttarakhand-263145, India
